name: government-website-modernization
description: Модернизация сайта администрации Экономического района с использованием современных технологий
author: Development Team

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.clean: npm run clean:frontend && npm run clean:backend
scripts.db:setup: npm run db:generate && npm run db:push && npm run db:seed
scripts.db:push: cd backend && npx prisma db push
scripts.db:migrate: cd backend && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:reset: cd backend && npx prisma migrate reset
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:coverage:frontend && npm run test:coverage:backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix:frontend && npm run lint:fix:backend
